tool_description: Using this API, you can get the details of mobile number and Land Line number all over India. You can find the state, Service Provider and DND etc. Soon other features will be adding to this API. Contact US for Mobile Name Finder API. Cheers, Arun
name: Mobile LandLine Info with DND stats India
title: Mobile LandLine Info with DND stats India
tool_name: Mobile LandLine Info with DND stats India

api_list.name: Mobile and Landline Info
api_list.description: GET Indian Mobile LandLine Info with DND stats

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: For Mobile Number Use a 10 Digit mobile number without using +91 and 0. For Landline Number User the number with 4 Digit Code Infront Ex. 04872279173
